item.description: Elon Musk and his AI have been busy. So has the TSA. And Amazon. Were you paying attention?

item.title: RealSense spins out of Intel to scale its stereoscopic imaging technology
item.description: RealSense is building vision tech that helps machines like robots and drones navigate and respond to a 3D world.

item.title: Tesla is already trying to expand its robotaxi service to Arizona
item.description: Tesla has applied for a permit to test and deploy autonomous vehicles in Arizona. It's also eyeing expansion in Austin, Texas, and California.

item.title: AWS is launching an AI agent marketplace next week with Anthropic as a partner
item.description: Amazon Web Services is launching an AI agent marketplace and Anthropic is one of its partners.

item.title: Head Start will be cut off for immigrants without legal status, Trump administration says
item.description: The Trump administration says it will restrict immigrants in the country illegally from enrolling in Head Start, a federally funded preschool program.
